attributes.action: Allow weddings of more than 15 people to match your indoor event numbers of 2000
attributes.additional_details: Weddings and funerals are big parts of peoples life’s. Your allowing sports events and people to enter in mass! Into a stadium but are stopping weddings and funerals, and people mixing from their own family’s but will allow 2000 strangers, shouting etc. In a stadium!
attributes.background:
The government is allowing up to 2000 people at indoor sporting events in tier 2 and more in tier 1 but your limiting numbers for weddings and funerals! This is ridiculous! 

The government need to allow normal wedding and funerals to go ahead to make your indoor event numbers

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329339
